All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
App
Main class of the application Contains the main method Creates a new Library object and runs the simulation
AppTest
 
Colors
 
Library
Represents a library Has a capacity defined in the constructor Has a semaphore to control the number of people in the library including the number of people who want to read and write Implements basic methods to control the library, mainly getters and setters
LibraryQueue
Represents a queue of people waiting to enter the library
PersonTest
 
Reader
Subclass of Person Represents a person who wants to read a book Requires 1 slot in the library
Writer
Subclass of Person Represents a person who wants to write a book Requires 5 slots in the library
